main_definition: Them is a pronoun used to refer to specific people or things previously mentioned, observed, or understood from the context.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A word used as an object of preposition or after verbs like give, tell, show
meanings_and_examples.example: I have no idea what to get them for their birthday.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Used in informal contexts to refer back to people being talked about
meanings_and_examples.example: Sarah and John are coming over later; don't forget to greet them at the door!

meanings_and_examples.definition: A plural third person pronoun, often used to indicate a group or category previously mentioned
meanings_and_examples.example: The team won the championship last year, but this year they are not performing well.
